title: Fix missing Daily Content (Tadabbur/Hadith/Islamic Quote) slides on Dashboard

requirements.text: Make the Dashboard daily content carousel render a visible empty state when no daily content exists, instead of rendering nothing.

quotes: fitur tambahkan slide untuk tampilkan motivasi harian (tadabbur, hadits, qoute islami) belum muncul

acceptanceCriteria: When `getContents()` returns an empty array, the Dashboard still shows a Daily Content section (card) with an English empty-state message (e.g., 'No daily content yet. Ask an admin to add Tadabbur, Hadith, and Islamic Quote in the Admin Panel.').
When `getContents()` returns at least one content item, the carousel renders and auto-rotates through the three labeled slide types: 'Tadabbur', 'Hadith', and 'Islamic Quote'.

requirements.text: Ensure the backend provides at least one DailyContent record so the Tadabbur/Hadith/Islamic Quote carousel has content by default on existing deployments (e.g., seed a default entry during upgrade if none exists).

quotes: fitur tambahkan slide untuk tampilkan motivasi harian (tadabbur, hadits, qoute islami) belum muncul

acceptanceCriteria: After upgrading an existing canister that has zero daily content items, `getContents()` returns at least one `DailyContent` item without requiring an admin to manually create it first.
Seeding logic does not overwrite existing admin-managed content if daily content items already exist.
Admin can still update/delete daily content via existing admin endpoints and the Dashboard reflects updates after refresh.

requirements.text: Add basic diagnostics for the daily content query failure path so the UI does not silently hide the daily content section when the fetch fails (e.g., show a small error state message in English).

quotes: fitur tambahkan slide untuk tampilkan motivasi harian (tadabbur, hadits, qoute islami) belum muncul

acceptanceCriteria: If the daily content query errors, the Dashboard shows an English error state message in the Daily Content section (instead of rendering nothing).
The rest of the Dashboard continues to render normally even if daily content loading fails.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files in frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add/adjust backend/migration.mo only if needed for upgrading existing state.
All user-facing text added/changed for this request must be in English.
nonGoals: Adding new slide categories beyond Tadabbur, Hadith, and Islamic Quote.
Changing authentication, roles, or admin/user access rules.
Adding external services or databases for content management.
